ProductInfo.Features:
22" (21.5" vis) professional grade LCD video monitor with over 570 TVL, 1080p: Resolution: 1920 x 1080.
3D comb filter with de-interlace and noise reduction; 50,000 hour rated lifespan.
Digital (HDMI)/ analog (composite & VGA) video imputs and 1 looping BNC input.
NTSC/PAL/SECAM auto detection; Certification: FCC, CE and CB.
HDMI cable, audio cable and VGA cable included; Construction-black plastic bezel and removable base.
ProductInfo.Name: Security Monitor 22-Inch Professional 3D Color LCD Wide Screen Audio Video Display with VGA and Looping BNC Inputs Speakers for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Black over 570 TVL
